text: Samsonov is the first goalie off the ice ahead of Game 6. Hell start for the #Caps tonight.
Ilya Samsonov first goalie off following Capitals morning skate. Looks to be Game 6 starter vs. Florida tonight
Ilya Samsonov is the first goalie off the ice at Capitals morning skate. Expected starter in net for Game 6 tonight vs Panthers.
Capitals coach Peter Laviolette confirms that Tom Wilson (lower body) remains out for Game 6 vs. Panthers tonight. And Ilya Samsonov starts in net again
